name: Wisdom Lift
description:
Work together to figure out how to escape the weird world of Wisdom Lift.
Made in Godot 3.2.4 - RC3

Credits:

Lachezar Hubanov

Pixel pack credits:

Update: We found a crash towards the end of the game, which was fixed in the v2 version. As noted in MiniJam's rules, we're leaving the v1 version up as well.
